name: guhIO
tagline: Make a reliable connected product within days!
body:
[quickinstall guhIO on your Raspberry](https://github.com/guh/guh/wiki/Raspberry-Pi#install-guh-on-debian-jessie-minimal-net-install-system)

![guhIO Logo](http://guh.guru/downloads/press/guhIO.png)
***
*guhIO* (/[guːh]/ - pronounced German and sounds like "*goo*") is an open source IoT server. 
It allows to control a lot of different devices from many different manufacturers (it translates between various machine languages). With the powerful rule engine you are able to connect any device and create individual behaviors for your application.

In order to use *guhIO* follow these links:

* A detailed description how to install and getting started with the *guhIO* can be found in the [guh | github wiki](https://github.com/guh/guh/wiki). 
* A detailed documentation of the source code can be found in the [guh | developer documentation](http://dev.guh.guru/).
